price: и говорио: 'Тражите од свога Господара опрост. Он, заиста, много прашта;
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
